title: Deploying L1 contracts on Goerli fails when following instructions of OP Stack Docs
body:
**Describe the bug**
When following the [current](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/15660862779df0d171e7725050d5f1483c8d8f95/docs/op-stack/src/docs/build/getting-started.md) _getting started_ page of the OP Stack documentation, one gets at the [first deployment step](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/15660862779df0d171e7725050d5f1483c8d8f95/docs/op-stack/src/docs/build/getting-started.md?plain=1#L243), which is this one:
```bash
forge script scripts/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --rpc-url $ETH_RPC_URL
```
The following error will be shown
```
, $.l2GenesisRegolithTimeOffset) 
    │   │   └─ ← "No matching value or array found for key $.l2GenesisRegolithTimeOffset"
    │   └─ ← 0 bytes of code
    └─ ← "No matching value or array found for key $.l2GenesisRegolithTimeOffset"



== Logs ==
  Connected to network with chainid 5
  Storing temp deployment data in /Users/userA/OP_stack_deployment/optimism/packages/contracts-bedrock/deployments/goerli/.deploy
  DeployConfig: reading file /Users/userA/OP_stack_deployment/optimism/packages/contracts-bedrock/deploy-config/goerli.json
Error: 
Script failed.
```

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Follow all steps of the  [getting started](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/15660862779df0d171e7725050d5f1483c8d8f95/docs/op-stack/src/docs/build/getting-started.md) page of the OP Stack doc up to [this line](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/15660862779df0d171e7725050d5f1483c8d8f95/docs/op-stack/src/docs/build/getting-started.md?plain=1#L243) (inclusive).

**Expected behavior**
Deployment succeeds.

**System Specs:**
 - OS: mac OS
 - commit hash: [1566086](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/commit/15660862779df0d171e7725050d5f1483c8d8f95)
